Events that occurred on 27 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1899 - Actor Gerik Schjelderup is born.
1907 - Author L. Sprague de Camp is born.
1914 - J.R.R. Tolkien reads The Voyage of EÃ¤rendel the Evening Star at a poorly attended meeting of Exeter College's Essay Club.
1914 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 2.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 157.
1977 - The 1977 animated version of The Hobbit is broadcast in the United States.
1993 - Magyar Tolkien Tarsasag, the Hungarian Tolkien Society, is founded.
1996 - Actress Alexandra Astin is born.
2001 - Music Inspired by Middle Earth, a musical album featuring many artists, including David Arkenstone, is released.
2006 - Actor Anthony Jackson dies.
2012 - The Hobbits: The Many Lives of Bilbo, Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
